text: The Flag of Fiji was created on October 1970. The history of Fiij dates back to ancient times. There are many theories of how the Fijian race came into existence. Around 1500 BC, Fiji was settled by Melaneasion sea farers. According to native oral legends Fijians were also descendants of a nomadic tribe from Tanzania. ==Appearance== It has a light Blue Ensign with the coat of arms centered on the outer half of the light blue field. ==References== Fiji Category:Fiji Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Flags with cantons
title: Flag of Fiji
